scripts.mongo-import-mac: mongoimport --host localhost --port 27017 --db cas-fee-project-2-rest-api --collection accesses --drop --file ./_backup/mongodb-collections/accesses.json; mongoimport --host localhost --port 27017 --db cas-fee-project-2-rest-api --collection admins --drop --file ./_backup/mongodb-collections/admins.json; mongoimport --host localhost --port 27017 --db cas-fee-project-2-rest-api --collection clients --drop --file ./_backup/mongodb-collections/clients.json; mongoimport --host localhost --port 27017 --db cas-fee-project-2-rest-api --collection sites --drop --file ./_backup/mongodb-collections/sites.json
scripts.mongo-import-win: "C:/"Program Files"/MongoDb/Server/3.4/bin/mongoimport.exe" --host localhost --port 27017 --db cas-fee-project-2-rest-api --collection accesses --drop --file ./_backup/mongodb-collections/accesses.json; mongoimport --host localhost --port 27017 --db cas-fee-project-2-rest-api --collection admins --drop --file ./_backup/mongodb-collections/admins.json; mongoimport --host localhost --port 27017 --db cas-fee-project-2-rest-api --collection clients --drop --file ./_backup/mongodb-collections/clients.json; mongoimport --host localhost --port 27017 --db cas-fee-project-2-rest-api --collection sites --drop --file ./_backup/mongodb-collections/sites.json
